topic.title: Watch: Macron Slapped in Face During Tour of France
topic.body:
https://www.infowars.com/posts/watch-macron-slapped-in-face-during-tour-of-france/

my problems : 

- mandatory vaxxing children in relation to agnes buzin clan.
- plants of the creation illegal.
- crazy&irrational pLandemic reaction.
- censorship.

Problem of the bearded man : “Down with Macronie!”

Prime Minister Jean Castex :

“Politics can in no way be about violence, verbal aggression, much less physical aggression…we are all concerned, this concerns the foundations of our democracy,” Castex said, speaking at a session of the National Assembly.

Why jail, torture, ruin people for plants of the creations? coca, poppy, cannabis? 
Why polanski could be a star?

Le Pen

“Although democratic debate can be bitter, it can by no means tolerate physical violence. I strongly condemn the unacceptable physical aggression targeting the President of the Republic,” 

weed? polanski? demographic invasion and population replacement? mad and confiscatory taxation? 
playing her hegelian dialectic opposition role better than her dad.

now ignore, ridicule, what ever... 

ps your boy is still alive... to the boy : not like at the "bank" :), leave : 1 term enough.

conclusion: the problem isn't macron, it's the 5th republic...

1_1Jp2TR8an7SBQ9mydr3CtCyCznrYGeWMj9.body: chykun chykun... throw corn, the little chickun will go out again...
ivermectin trials coming... macron may be guillotined by the people of france... a sinister end for the jupiterian... but first to test the blade, miss agnes buzin will do the test run.
